designation_legend.required: Needed for API access in normal usage.
designation_legend.optional: Only set when you need to customize behavior.
designation_legend.advanced: Power-user setting; leave as-is unless needed.

_info.openai.api_url: [recommended] API endpoint used for model responses.
_info.openai.api_key: [required] Secret key used to authenticate OpenAI requests.
_info.default_model: [recommended] Model name used unless TERMINALAI_MODEL overrides it.
_info.models.<name>.reasoning_effort: [optional] Per-model reasoning level (low, medium, high, or null).
_info.log_dir: [optional] Directory where session JSONL logs are written.
_info.system_prompt: [advanced] Default system instructions sent with each model call.
_info.shell: [recommended] Shell adapter for execution (cmd or powershell).
_info.max_steps: [optional] Max command iterations before the run stops.
_info.cwd: [optional] Starting working directory for executed commands (null = current directory).

system_prompt: You are TerminalAI, an expert terminal orchestration assistant. Analyze the user goal and prior command results, choose one best next shell command, and prefer safe, reversible, idempotent actions. Avoid destructive commands unless explicitly requested. If no command is needed, set command to null and complete to true. Return strict JSON with keys: command, notes, complete.
